statements: SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE threat_type = 'Malware'
SELECT feed_name, indicator, confidence_level FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE confidence_level > 7
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE published_date > '2021-10-15' ORDER BY confidence_level DESC
SELECT feed_name, source FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE threat_type = 'Phishing' AND confidence_level >= 5
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE source LIKE '%Threat%'
SELECT feed_name, threat_type, indicator FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE confidence_level > 70 ORDER BY published_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE source = 'Symantec' OR source = 'FireEye' ORDER BY confidence_level DESC
SELECT feed_name, indicator, source FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' AND confidence_level >= 50 ORDER BY published_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT source FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY source
SELECT feed_name, threat_type, indicator, confidence_level FROM ThreatIntelligenceFeeds WHERE confidence_level < 30 ORDER BY confidence_level ASC
SELECT * FROM threat_intel_feeds;
SELECT feed_name, threat_type FROM threat_intel_feeds WHERE feed_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM threat_detection WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT feed_name, threat_description FROM threat_intel_feeds WHERE feed_name LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT feed_id, MAX(detection_time) AS latest_detection_time FROM threat_detection GROUP BY feed_id;
SELECT * FROM threat_intel_feeds WHERE threat_type='Malware' ORDER BY feed_name DESC
SELECT feed_name, threat_type FROM threat_intel_feeds WHERE feed_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT feed_id, COUNT(detection_id) AS num_detections FROM threat_detection GROUP BY feed_id HAVING num_detections > 10
SELECT detection_time, threat_level, threat_source FROM threat_detection WHERE feed_id = 2 ORDER BY detection_time ASC
SELECT feed_id, feed_name, threat_type, threat_description FROM threat_intel_feeds JOIN threat_detection ON threat_intel_feeds.feed_id = threat_detection.feed_id AND threat_level='Critical'
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds;
SELECT feed_name, feed_source FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE threat_level = 'High';
SELECT event_description, event_timestamp FROM threat_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT action_name, action_type FROM mitigation_actions WHERE action_type = 'Alert';
SELECT feed_id, COUNT(event_id) AS num_events FROM threat_events GROUP BY feed_id HAVING num_events > 5;
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE threat_level='High';
SELECT feed_name, feed_source FROM threat_intelligence_feeds ORDER BY feed_name DESC;
SELECT event_timestamp, event_description FROM threat_events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT feed_name, threat_level FROM threat_intelligence_feeds JOIN threat_events ON threat_intelligence_feeds.feed_id = threat_events.feed_id WHERE event_description LIKE '%attack%';
SELECT action_name, action_type FROM mitigation_actions WHERE action_type='Alert' ORDER BY action_name;
SELECT * FROM threat_feeds;
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_feeds WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM indicators ORDER BY threat_level DESC;
SELECT indicator_name, indicator_type FROM indicators WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT action_name, action_type, action_description FROM mitigation_actions WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM threat_feeds WHERE id = 1;
SELECT indicator_name, threat_level FROM indicators WHERE threat_level > 5 ORDER BY indicator_name DESC;
SELECT event_timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Malware';
SELECT action_name, action_description FROM mitigation_actions WHERE action_type = 'Preventive' LIMIT 3;
SELECT feed_name, feed_url FROM threat_feeds WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds;
SELECT feed_name, threat_category FROM threat_intelligence_feeds ORDER BY threat_category DESC;
SELECT * FROM indicators WHERE source_feed_id = 1;
SELECT id, detection_timestamp, threat_score FROM detections WHERE is_mitigated = FALSE ORDER BY detection_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_actions WHERE action_type = 'Block' AND action_details LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT * FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE threat_level > 5;
SELECT feed_name, threat_category FROM threat_intelligence_feeds WHERE threat_level < 3 ORDER BY feed_name DESC;
SELECT id, indicator_value, indicator_type FROM indicators WHERE source_feed_id = 2 AND indicator_type = 'IP';
SELECT * FROM detections WHERE is_mitigated = false AND threat_score BETWEEN 5 AND 8 ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT detection_timestamp, threat_score, is_mitigated FROM detections JOIN indicators ON detections.indicator_id = indicators.id WHERE indicators.source_feed_id = 1;
